title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to integrate Ollama endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that adds Ollama models as LLM or chat backends with tool support.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, RAG, user roles) packaged in a single Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and model init jobs.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (Windows/Mac/Linux).

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor or explain code using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration to inject Ollama Java client as a bean with YAML config.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings, and tool calling support.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express middleware that proxies and caches Ollama endpoints for web apps.

title: chatbot-ui-ollama
summary: Port of Chatbot UI pre-configured to work with local Ollama models instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama and models baked in.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models with slash commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers over Ollama REST API with serde models.
